name: Add-on Popularity
query:
SELECT
    child.item,
    COUNT(child.item) as sold_count
FROM
    `tabAirplane Ticket Add-on Item` as child
JOIN
    `tabAirplane Ticket` as parent ON child.parent = parent.name
WHERE
    parent.docstatus = 1  -- Only count items from 'Submitted' tickets
GROUP BY
    child.item
ORDER BY
    sold_count DESC  -- Sorts by count in descending order
